data: Limoges | rue de la Vieille-Poste | rue de la Cite | middle-ages
Limoges | rue de la Vieille-Poste | rue de la Cite

In the lower town of Limoges, at the corner of the rue de la Vieille-Poste and the rue de la Cite might have been seen, a generation ago, one of those shops which were scarcely changed from the period of the middle-ages.
